Title: Two Piece Trumpet Evening Dress with Mandarin Collar

Featured-image: CK34-aqua-two-piece-trumpet-evening-dress-with-mandarin-collar_p.jpg

----

Description: The two piece features a halter top with a mandarin collar and a scalloped hem line. The intricate bodice is designed with an Indian style. The trumpet skirt is pleated at the bottom and sweeps into a train.
